description:
A search for Kain goes awry as Ageha and Matsugo continue to fight for Rinne`s affection. Later, Sakura notices that Rinne, who never studies, is passing every test. How?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hanabatake no Nazo / Migiude Kashimasu / Kuroi Tsuuchihyou
Le mystère du champ de fleurs – Je te prête ma main droite – Le noir bulletin scolaire
Mystery of the Flower Field / I Will Lend You My Right Arm / Black Report Card
花畑の謎 / 右腕貸します / 黒い通知表
